name: gust
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pok√©mon in the air.

flavor_text.x-y: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
